segments.text: Good morning . I ’ m looking for a one-bedroom apartment downtown .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Certainly , sir . How much rent did you want to pay ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I didn ’ t want to pay more than $ 520 a month .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: $ 520 a month ? We don ’ t often have apartments as inexpensive as that.We have one apartment for $ 599 a month , on Seventh Avenue . It ’ s near the station .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No . it ’ s unfurnished . It has a kitchen , but no oven.There ’ s a garden in the back , but the tenants can ’ t use it.The landlord lives downstairs.Friends are forbidden in the apartment after midnight . No noise and no television after 11
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , thank you ! I want an apartment , not a prison .
segments.speaker: S1
